turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey Im thinking of getting some coffee from Starbucks, would you want some?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yeah that sounds good.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: If you order it up I'll pay for it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Deal

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay I want a White Chocolate Mocha.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: How big?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want a Venti.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok how about any special milk or whip cream?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah i want whip cream but just regular whole milk

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you sure you don't want any extra shots of expresso?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: actually yeah great idea get my extra shot in it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok so Venti White Chocolate Mocha with whip cream and extra shot or expresso?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yep thats it and get you what ever you want. food too if you are hungry

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok yeah I am going to get a bagel too.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: alright have it ready for pick up at that Starbucks off McVay Dr. in Mobile.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The one bye Fire House Subs.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yep thats it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: okay and just use your card i got on file?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: thats right. ill see you here in a bit.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: okay they order is in and should be ready and waiting
